website_summaries.verdict: A must-have for any group camping trip where you may get lost or encounter wild animals.
pros: Similar in volume to a car alarm, the device includes a fake off button to confuse potential attackers
Should the battery ever die, this personal alarm has a built-in emergency whistle, which is also quite loud
Perfect for hiking or camping trips should you get separated from your group
cons: Alarm is sometimes triggered after the device has been dropped or has fallen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work!!
customer_reviews.text: Received two of these today. They were poorly packaged and the box contained no packing slip or instructions. Neither one of them works, absolutely nothing happens when I pressed the button. It also contains a whistle, which makes hardly any noise...it certainly wouldn't scare anyone! Very disappointed in this useless product. Will immediately return this order.

customer_reviews.title: Complete Waste of Money

customer_reviews.text: Gave these as Xmas gifts to the women in my family and they were a big hit. They make a lot of noise and hopefully would scare off a potential predator!!!
customer_reviews.author: W. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for granddaughters and daughters
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was accosted by a man early hours of morning after work, she was so frightened. Bought this Vigilant personal protec. Sys. She feels more secure because it makes such a loud sound it would scare any possible assailant. Many thanks for such a great product. Purchased two more for daughter and second granddaughter. Have passed the word along for such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect addition to our key fob to maintain safety. It is easy to use and loud. Also easy to turn off if need be but you must be familiar with product to know where off button is which is good.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie DeRienzo

customer_reviews.title: I am somewhat disappointed in the fact that there wasn't even 1 piece ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tested this as it was to be mailed to my niece and did not want to remove the tab over battery before mailing. I am somewhat disappointed in the fact that there wasn't even 1 piece of information in the box such as a brochure with explanation on how to use. I printed the information that was emailed to me and included. I don't feel that is very professional to NOT include a brochure of some kind. I am rating this as 4 stars because it had one of the best reviews not from personal experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen T. Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Would easily draw attention from 500ft away.
customer_reviews.text: My mother bought me this as being a young women living on my own and working late nights she worried. This is the loudest, ear shattering, room echoing noise you have ever heard. I most of the time don’t know how to turn it off. Never have I used it in an emergency but if I needed to drawl attention. This would do it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Personal protection
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter as part of her personal safety “system” found on her car keys. ITS SO LOUD! Makes a parent feel a bit better when she is leaving work at night.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Snow

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Loud as hell and if they don’t know how to turn it off they won’t figure it out easy . Bought it for my girlfriend when she would walk to the car after work . Good product!
customer_reviews.author: GMP

customer_reviews.title: I like better than mace because for mace to be effective ...
customer_reviews.text: excited about product i bought several as gifts for my daughter and daughter in law. I like better than mace because for mace to be effective you have to be CLOSE to the person to administer. This you can use much earlier and faster. I like the fact that it includes a whistle if the battery has gone dead. EXCELLENT. Hope I never have to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This alarm is not really loud, i tested it out in a shopping plaza no one even looked my way, its sounds ok inside of the house because it echos but outside it just sounds like a mini car alarm..maybe i received a used one? Not sure, btw this sounds like a car alarm, people usually ignore call alarms a loud screech would draw much more attention
customer_reviews.author: christ

customer_reviews.title: Safety and convenience!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a stocking stuffer for my college student granddaughter. There are times she feels vulnerable in the school parking areas in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Griswold

customer_reviews.title: Goes off way too easy
customer_reviews.text: It's loud and definitely draws attention so that's good. It will however easily go off in your purse if something is pushed against it which is very embarrassing.. After only carrying it with me a few times it has gone into my kitchen drawer now.. Not sure I will get much use out of it, I will probably only carry it with me if I find it really necessary. I would recommend trying a different alarm, maybe you will find one that is less sensitive and easy to turn on by accident than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protection system
customer_reviews.text: Excellent protection system. Press a button and a very loud beep, beep, beep sounds. Press a button on the back and it silences the beeping. I have attached it to my keychain and feel much more comfortable when I am out and about.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very loud product--just make sure the dogs are outside when you test it. A very good security device and it is a great attention getter.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Super Duper LOUD
customer_reviews.text: This thing is LOUD. I bought 2 -- one for me and one for my nana. It's great to have just in case of emergencies. The only reason I would MAYBE try a different one next time around is because I'm always paranoid that I'll accidentally hit the button and it will go off. But that's likely just a matter of overthinking it. I always recommend this to friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Grayson

customer_reviews.title: Good Unit and Very Loud!
customer_reviews.text: This little honker is loud indeed! Use earplugs when testing it if possible, as it's very loud. Push the front button to initiate the alarm and you have to push the little button on the back to stop it. Lightweight, nice size, love the keychain feature.
customer_reviews.author: M. White

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it is my fault and I did not read the ad carefully. I thought I was buying pepper spray. Cost more to return than it is worth. It looks like it is cheaply made. Maybe worth it if it was $5
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Van Leeuwen

customer_reviews.title: Nice alarm for adults.
customer_reviews.text: This alarm is really nice. It's loud enough to be a bit obnoxious, which is good but may be too loud for a child to use. It also has replaceable batteries, is lightweight and small, so easy to carry. Comes in a variety of colors.
customer_reviews.author: R. P.

customer_reviews.title: Very loud, easy to use, hard for someone not familiar with it to turn off.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, very loud, well designed for secure activation. My wife carries this with her when she goes out for her walks. Her plan, if ever needed, is to activate it and toss it away. If your not familiar with it you will not be able to turn it off. And it is very loud.
customer_reviews.author: BBCUE05

customer_reviews.title: This will do the job.
customer_reviews.text: This personal alarm is everything it was advertised. It's loud, has a whistle in the event the batteries die. It's perfect for scaring off would be attackers and attracting the attention of others. This is a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne G. Gifford

customer_reviews.title: Looks like good quality personal alarm
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as stated. Looks like good quality personal alarm. Tested with speaker down in palm as advised and it was loud and attention getting. Am pleased with purchase and will recommend this to anyone needing such an alarm for safety.
customer_reviews.author: E.P.K.

customer_reviews.title: Security and peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Really loud and, I imagine, very effective (especially in a garage). Bought two for the ladies in my life, and I’m glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Sam T.

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I tested it and it's really loud! Easy to use; a little bulkier than a car alarm's remote. I'm even more aware of my surroundings with the personal alarm on me!
customer_reviews.author: Mocha

customer_reviews.title: FEEL MORE SECURE
customer_reviews.text: The alarm is VERY loud and should scare off any would-be attacker. The whistle is a bonus. I understand it passes TSA so will definitely take it with me on my next trip to Europe as well as domestic flights.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: I feel more safe now!
customer_reviews.text: What a great little device!! Small, attaches stylishly to my purse, and works perfectly! What a wonderful "attention getter" if ever needed. Quite loud... easy to turn on and off! I highly recommend for anyone in need of a safety device!
customer_reviews.author: G. Mattern

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Think every college girl should have this. I carry this when I go walking on trails by myself. It is very loud!!!! I accidentally set it off and wow! Easy to use turn on and off. Well made. Will purchase more for my granddaughters!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: The whistle is not loud and if you blow too hard it makes no sound at all. The 130 dcb alarm seems louder indoors than in outdoor open areas.
customer_reviews.author: DuRoc

customer_reviews.title: Great security
customer_reviews.text: Love the security this gives us. I feel more confident riding mass transit or walking through town when I have this in my pocket. Hopefully someday they’ll make a smaller version but until then I love this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS! its awesome..
customer_reviews.text: This is AWESOME! Its a stocking stuffer for my daughter who is in college..and I just tested it..and almost fell off my chair..its super loud and surely would scare off anyone. great purchase.. very glad I got this..
customer_reviews.author: bck

customer_reviews.title: Really loud and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! The alarm is loud and so is the whistle. I feel safer having it around. I would recommed to anyone who wants to feel safer and have a loud noise to scare off attackers.
customer_reviews.author: MichellePire

customer_reviews.title: Small buttons, big noise
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly. You push the small button on the front (left of the big speaker) to turn it on, and push the small button on the back to turn it off. It's small enough that you can carry it in your pocket while you're walking. Now we cross our fingers that it scares off perpetrators and attracts helpful citizens.
customer_reviews.author: Ready Reference

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: after ordering 4 body alarms from another company. it was great to get a product that actually works. It is clipped to my purse. It is loud and easy to use. Every female needs to get this if anyone comes near you and you are afraid push a button.
customer_reviews.author: JMGibson

customer_reviews.title: Very loud noise to alert people
customer_reviews.text: This is a very loud personal alarm if needed. Fits on a key chain . My college granddaughter loves it..she carries it will her all the time... very loud to alert help...must easier to use in case of an emergency. ..
customer_reviews.author: grannybear

customer_reviews.title: Personal alarm
customer_reviews.text: Alarm is reliable. It is loud and easy to activate. I actually set it off during church service. OOPS! Make sure you know how to shut it off. I am thinking of buying these for my daughters for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Char sews

customer_reviews.title: Great for telemarketers
customer_reviews.text: I have my unit hanging right next to my phone and when I get a repeat telemarketer call - after I have told them that I am on the "NO CALL LIST", I start the alarm and then press the answer button - no need to say anything. After 2 or 3 tries, they get the message.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Bonsack
